msg_text_desc: Text for speech synthesis, length limited to less than 10000 characters. Try not to exceed 3000 characters, otherwise generation speed will be slow.
ph_input_content: Enter content, type "/" to insert variables
tip_emotion: Control the emotion of synthesized speech. The model will automatically match appropriate emotions based on input text, generally no need to manually specify. This parameter only takes effect for speech-2.6-hd, speech-2.6-turbo, speech-02-hd, speech-02-turbo, speech-01-hd, speech-01-turbo models.
tip_text_normalization: Whether to enable Chinese and English text normalization. When enabled, it improves performance in number reading scenarios, but slightly increases latency. Default value is false.
tip_sample_rate: Sample rate of generated audio. Optional range [8000, 16000, 22050, 24000, 32000, 44100], default is 32000.
tip_bitrate: Bitrate of generated audio. Optional range [32000, 64000, 128000, 256000], default value is 128000. This parameter only takes effect for mp3 format audio.
tip_format: Format of generated audio. wav is only supported in non-streaming output mode.
tip_channel: Number of channels of generated audio.
tip_sound_effect: Sound effect settings, only one can be selected at a time, optional.
tip_small_language_recognition: Whether to enhance recognition of specified minor languages and dialects
tip_output_format: Parameter to control output format. Optional value range [url, hex]. This parameter only takes effect in non-streaming scenarios. Streaming scenarios only support hex format. The returned url is valid for 24 hours.
tip_constant_bitrate_control: Constant bitrate (cbr) control for audio. Optional values: false, true. When set to true, audio encoding will use constant bitrate. Note: This parameter only takes effect when audio is set to streaming output and audio format is mp3.
tip_subtitle_service: Control whether to enable subtitle service. Default value is false. This parameter is only effective in non-streaming output scenarios, and only for speech-2.6-hd, speech-2.6-turbo, speech-02-turbo, speech-02-hd, speech-01-turbo, speech-01-hd models.
label_add_audio_rhythm_mark: Add Audio Rhythm Mark at End of Synthesized Audio
tip_add_audio_rhythm_mark: Control whether to add audio rhythm mark at the end of synthesized audio. Default value is False. This parameter only takes effect for non-streaming synthesis.
